channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wobbly, loose slabs, 27th August
item.description:
This is a ramp. Intended for those that can’t use the steps. There are broken slabs, wobbly slabs, sunken slabs. None have been addressed. Multiple reports.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hopton Street, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish everywhere - please address, 27th August
item.description:

item.title: Flags and st george cross spray painted everywheee, 27th August
item.description:

item.title: Bin caught on fire, 27th August
item.description:

item.title: Overflowing commercial waste bin, 27th August
item.description:
Commercial waste bin is overflowing. Wheels are missing so appears to not be being emptied. It stinks and is attracting pests. Bin is in alleyway next to 37 Kersley Road, N16 0NT Bin is for Escocesa restaurant, N16 0AR.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
